mapper.insert: insert into scfp_fundaccount (uaccount,ename,residual,status,pay_pass) value (#{uaccount},#{ename},#{residual},"申请开通",#{pay_pass})
mapper.update: update scfp_fundaccount set pay_pass=#{pay_pass} where id = #{id}
update scfp_fundaccount set faccount=#{faccount},status="已开通" where id=#{id}
